In adolescent boys, sometimes, the muscles of the developing voice box go out of control and a high  pitched voice becomes hoarse
Many young people get acne and pimples on the face during adolescence because of the increased activity of these glands in the skin
The period of life, when the body undergoes changes, leading to reproductive maturity, is called adolescence
Some may grow suddenly at puberty and then slow down, while others may grow gradually
The male hormone or testosterone begins to be released by the testes at the onset of puberty
The pituitary also secretes thyroid hormone which is necessary for the normal growth of a person.
Endocrine glands release hormones into the bloodstream to reach a particular body part called ATP site.
The period of life, when the body undergoes changes, leading to emotional maturity, is called adolescence.
The male hormone or testosterone begins to be released by the testes at the onset of erection.
